forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Becoming windy. Low 49F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.
